dmca.title: Notification of Infringement of Copyright
dmca.body:
Attn: Blogger Legal Support,
DMCA Complaints 
Fax: (650) 618-2680 

NOTIFICATION OF INFRINGEMENT OF COPYRIGHT 
BACKGROUND 

I am a Blogger user (my blog address is: http://koluki.blogspot.com/) and lately 
have been the victim of a string of attacks from another user, whose address is this: http://ma1ongomiamorblogspot.com. In the last few posts on her blog she, first attacks me and my family with false and defamatory content that can put our lives at risk for political reasons in my country of origin (in this post: 
http://malongomiamor.blogspot.com/2007/03/dolo.html); second she starts to use my poetry in a way that constitutes unauthorised use of copyrighted content and 
tainting it with her explicitly pornographic material (in several posts listed below). All this because she visited my blog once a couple of weeks ago and when I first saw her blog and realised that it was pornographic informed her in my blog that I didn
